Question
========

The following is an indication of 5 individuals as to how they are ranked in terms of authoritarian behavior and social status:______________. Authoritarian behavior: 3, 1, 5, 4, 2. Social status: 3, 4, 5, 2, 1. The value of the Spearman correlation coefficient here is

Answerlist
----------

* 0.2
* 0.267
* 0.3
* 0.9

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.2: Incorrect
* 0.267: Incorrect
* 0.3: Correct
* 0.9: Incorrect
